name: CommunityHelpers
0:
”Alexa, open Community Helpers”
”Alexa, start Community Helpers”
”Alexa, launch Community Helpers”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: community helpers
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Community Helpers is a fun trivia game developed to teach kids about the people in their neighborhood. The questions are sprinkled with sound effects, a little bit of humor, and a few hints. It's great for small children and for kids that need
a little more support in learning about the world around them. New helpers will be added regularly. So,
don't forget to visit us again.

To start, you can say:
"Alexa, open Community Helpers"
"Alexa, start Community Helpers"

The development of this Skill was sparked because we saw how my kids (who are on the Spectrum)
gravitated to spontaneous conversations with Alexa. So, we decided to use their interest of engagement
to our advantage (and theirs) by creating skills that will help them achieve their ABA and Social Skills
goals. And, if this can help our children, we're sure that it will help yours.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
